sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import MenuBar from '../components/menu-bar' import './book.css' import csappCover from '../images/csapp.png' export default function BookPage() { const [cover, setCover] = useState(), [title, setTitle] = useState(), [author, setAuthor] = useState(), [category, setCategory] = useState(), [price, setPrice] = useState(), [state, setState] = useState({ flag: false }), [intro, setIntro] = useState() useEffect(() => { setCover(csappCover) setTitle('深入理解计算机系统') setAuthor("Randal E. Bryant / David R. O'Hallaron") setCategory('计算机科学') setPrice(100.00) setState({ flag: true, count: 100 }) setIntro('本书是计算机系统领域的经典教材，全面讲解了计算机系统的基本概念和原理，涵盖了计算机硬件、操作系统和编译器等方面的知识。') }) return (

{title}

作者：{author}

分类：{category}

定价：¥{price}

状态：{state.flag ? '有货 库存' + state.count + '件' : '无货'}

简介：{intro}

) }
